summary: A neocomplcache plugin for `/usr/bin/look` for completing words in English.
name: neco-look
description:
A neocomplcache plugin for `/usr/bin/look` for completing English.

http://gyazo.com/c21c8201fa7a571c7665bc7455d88631.png
install_details: * install the latest neocomplcache.vim* make sure if you already have `look` command* Unarchive neco-look and put it into a dir of your &rtp.

versions.release_notes: Bugfix. It doesn't crash when you input a multibyte word
